mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_history ( HISTORY_NO, REG_DATE, SHOP_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, AMOUNT, PRICE, CARD_NO ) VALUES ( #{historyNo}, #{regDate}, #{shopName}, #{productName}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{cardNo} );
mapper.select: SELECT a.history_no, a.reg_date, a.shop_name, a.product_name, a.amount, a.price, a.card_no, a.AMOUNT * a.PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE, ( SELECT SUM(b.AMOUNT * b.PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TB_HISTORY b WHERE b.history_no = a.history_no ) AS each_balance FROM tb_history a
SELECT sum(AMOUNT * PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM TB_HISTORY
SELECT ( a.BALANCE - SUM(b.AMOUNT * b.PRICE) ) AS totalbalance FROM tb_card a INNER JOIN tb_history b
